website_summaries.verdict: This classic-looking skirt comes in enough colors to match almost any nursery theme, for a boy or girl.
pros: Finished baby hem and split corners to help make changing it quick and easy
Machine wash cold with like colors
cons: Wrinkles easily, but you can iron them out

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't "need" this but it added the perfect touch to the nursery. Makes the crib look "fancy" even though all the "rules" preclude blankets, bumpers, toys, etc. This takes the plain fitted sheet and makes the crib look pretty. Fits standard crib, washes well and haven't had any problems. Used it for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Cara NormanTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but.....
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice but it didn't fit my standard sized crib. I still made it work because it was the cheapest crib skirt I could find. I do still believe it's a little over priced for a CRIB skirt, I brought the one for my queen sized bed for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: almost like somebody had washed it with a red item and ...
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled this out of the packaging, the top part (under the mattress) was white but the skirt had an obvious red/pink tint to it, almost like somebody had washed it with a red item and then returned it. I figured for the good price it was worth trying to clean it myself rather than exhange it. Luckily one extra hot wash with OxiClean and it's back to looking white. Fits the crib great.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunna

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be longer
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be longer and that it would be adjustable but that's probably my own fault for not paying more attention when I ordered it. It looks great anyways though!
customer_reviews.author: bqueern92

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: Fits as it should. Doesn’t steam or iron very well. Looks kinda cheap. Didn’t want to spend much, so it’s acceptable for price.
customer_reviews.author: Alre83

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but a bit too long.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in the crib for 6 weeks now. I have the crib set to the highest position for an infant and the skirt touches the ground and is a good height. The one thing I don't like is that when I do lower the crib mattress as my baby grows, the skirt is going to be too long. It already touches the floor and it will get lowered another inch or two, so there will be quite a bit of excess on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: klmart08

customer_reviews.title: this was a great little bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: this was a great little bed skirt. It held up well and looked really good. It stayed in place when we turned it into a toddler bed as well. I gave our crib to a family in need and included the bed skirt because it was still in good shaped. fit the bed perfectly. no more babies for me, but if I did I would use this skirt again.
customer_reviews.author: Danirae

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality bed skirt! The flat part that holds the skirt and rests on the springs was high quality cotton, the same as the skirt itself. Some companies make this part out of paper for pete's sake, which falls apart and you cannot use the skirt at all. This one is a quality product. I am very happy with every single purchase of American Baby items and think that Amazon is a wonderful company to make purchases from. Very happy with the product and the purchase experience!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I first started looking at crib bedding. How can something so small be so expensive. I bought this crib skirt as soon as I found it. It looks great in my daughters bedroom. I have her crib on the highest setting right now, and the skirt skims the floor. UPDATE: Just moved the crib mattress down to the lowest position and the skirt does bunch up on the floor, but it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Great price and does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Great price and does what it says. I bought it as a back up since I had bought a matching crib skirt and sheet, I thought this would be great if those were in the wash or just to change it up a bit:)
customer_reviews.author: Golden_Sol

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: More see through than pictured, but still a good cover! it went well with the nursery theme being that it’s sunflowers and mainly white.
customer_reviews.author: Keyonna

customer_reviews.title: The bed skirt is pretty and fairly good quality but after I washed it
customer_reviews.text: Holy wrinkles! The bed skirt is pretty and fairly good quality but after I washed it, before putting it on my daughter crib, it was SO wrinkly! Took an hour to iron.
customer_reviews.author: AmzonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Not a whole lot to say about this product, except that it fits well (have not washed/dried yet) and looks nice. It serves its purpose, although it is somewhat of a pain to get it to lay just so in a crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with crib
customer_reviews.text: Was shopping for bed skirts for my daughters crib and it was so pricey at the store that I decided to check on Amazon instead and these did not disappoint at all. Goes on so well with her crib, and the quality of it is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Coua Vue

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great condition, covers the gap when mattress is in ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition, covers the gap when mattress is in the highest position, soft, little wrinkled after washing and drying but it's ok due to its ruffled appearance. Will not iron it as it looks fine. Did not shrink after one wash, crib is 28 in x 52 in. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: marta

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral dust ruffle for baby crib. Would go with pretty much any decor.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our crib. Just enough sweetness with the simple ruffles. Great for any gender baby crib.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan L.

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: They are fine. They are stark white so if your trying to match something they are semi sheer and like hospital bed sheet white. Came pretty wrinkled. But fit well in a standard size crib. Didn't match what I was going for but can use with other sets. Overall decent.
customer_reviews.author: katelynn gatzke

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: As dust ruffles go, this one is so-so. The fabric is fairly thin, and the gathers are pretty slim. It fits fine, and it's nice to have the split corners. I would just call it adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Player Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite surprised
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I purchased this crib skirt due to it being cheap compared to the others, but I am actually quite surprised about the quality of it. For the price it's great quality and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great crib skirt!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for my sone crib to hide the underneath his bed!
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, white
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Graco crib! This has slit corners so it can hang straight. It's an actual white, not off-white or cream. Looks great. Now I can store stuff under the crib!
customer_reviews.author: Moslof

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper quality than expected. I kept it but will definitely not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with the crib. I didn't want to pay a lot for something like this so this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: So hard to get the wrinkles out! I dried it after I washed it and that made it worse . Don't even bother trying to iron it .
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, could be better but does the job and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and such a better deal than any brands in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, beautiful, & affordable crib skirt.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crib skirt to hide what I am storing under a 32 year old slotted crib. The skirt is simple yet beautiful and fits perfectly hiding the diapers, wipes, and pack-n-play beneath the crib. I'm very pleased with my purchase & would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Webster

customer_reviews.title: Pottery Barn Look-a-like
customer_reviews.text: I found a similar crib skirt at PB for three times the price. This crib skirt looks just as good on our crib! I also have washed it many times and it still looks great. It is very wrinkly after shipping and washing though so I usually iron it to give it a cleaner look.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Ruffled Crib Skirt
customer_reviews.text: This item washed and dried nicely. It fit perfect and was easy to use. I would order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere in stores for a plain white skirt. So what do you do when you cant find it in stores. Amazon it is! Great value fits perfect and looks great. Just as described and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt was the perfect addition to our daughters room!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Too long, drags on the floor
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for our son's crib because it's way too long and drags on the floor. The crib we have is lower to the ground do I suppose if you had a higher up crib or were willing to hem up the skirt it would work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Cook

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute but Shrinks and Wrinkles a Lot
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt looks cute, but it shrunk a lot when I washed it and it is SO wrinkly that I had to steam it, even after several tumble dry low cycles trying to get the wrinkles out... I should have figured since it's 100% cotton and has a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lascell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is so cute and great quality!! I was amazed when I got it! Since it was only $12 I thought i couldn't expect much. I'm glad I ordered it! Look so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Too big for portable crib
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice crib skirt but it is too big for a portable crib. I made it work by stuffing the extra under the mattress but it's definitely too big.
customer_reviews.author: L. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable in our baby girls nursery. Quick shipping and a great price for the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: Great ruffle crib skirt. Fits perfectly on my crib providing an elegant touch to it. Very decent price given my research and unisex also. I would recommend it to all moms that need a ruffle crib skirt.
customer_reviews.author: DoyZ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it in white
customer_reviews.text: looks cheap (in white) and I can see through behind the dust ruffle and vaguely see the junk stored under my daughters crib. Accidentally threw away packing so I can't return and am stuck staring at it. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Take awhile to get all the wrinkles out but amazing crib skirt for the price!
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyODaniel

customer_reviews.title: Skirt
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and crispy white Love it wish it was longer though like it to reach the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: nice to hide below the mattress
customer_reviews.text: cute and adds a nice touch to cover up the metal under the mattress- much prettier!
customer_reviews.author: AZShopper

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the length of the skirt but it almost touches the floor when the crib is on the lowest level. Overall I'm pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! It doesn't quite reach the floor with the mattress set on the highest setting, but once we lower it, I am sure it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic crib skirt - nothing fancy, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I had the hardest time finding a crib skirt that wasn't part of a whole bedding set. I purchased this one in white and blue - they are basic but do the job. Decent price. Arrived quickly. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ac323

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Standard bedskirt hoping it would be a little longer but still looks clean and crisp and nice
customer_reviews.author: Anne.mourning

customer_reviews.title: Great bedskirt!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bedskirt. If you've been looking around for a plain, white one (at at reasonable price), you probably know that they are VERY hard to find. We have cute printed sheets in the crib, so this style/color is perfect with anything like that. The skirt itself was pretty wrinkled when I took it out of the packaging, but 10 minutes with an iron and it looked great (and the quality of the fabric is good too). Very simple looking and not too girly/ruffly. Definitely an awesome purchase for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: kek162

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect fit. Looks adorable in my daughter's shabby chic nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Webb

customer_reviews.title: Simple bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, but fits the bill for simple coordination in my baby's nursery. Fit our crib with no issues. Washed and dried well.
customer_reviews.author: BSH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect, simple crib skirt for my daughter's nursery at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not quite long enough to touch the floor. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite long enough to touch the floor. The reason that I wanted a crib skirt was to hide some under the crib storage but this doesn't quite hide everything as it's too short.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice crib skirt. Nothing fancy but does the job. Price was good considering how expensive crib skirts can be. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Pulurian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit perfectly on my standard size crib. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit perfectly on my standard size crib. It's too small but it still works and I still am using it!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan VanDerLeest

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 9 months. It washes nicely and looks great. I am so glad I purchased this rather than one of those sets. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PernFamily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, whole skirt is cotton and not that crappy cheap poly "fabric".
customer_reviews.author: Dana V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt is the perfect length. It looks great with out crib set and I would definitely recommend, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dana N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described. Simple white crib skirt. Will need to iron once it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Worked and fit very nicely
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to daughter for a baby shower gift. Washed up nice and put on the crib.
customer_reviews.author: kathy herrington

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very basic crib skirt. Nothing fancy but it serves its purpose. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: ajn714

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it might look cheap because the other crib skirts I looked at were much more expensive. Looks great and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a crib, fits nice and good quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy

customer_reviews.title: perf
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect white crib skirt! Simple and good quality I would recommend this to anyone. Cotton material does great in washer too
customer_reviews.author: SMS07

customer_reviews.title: Simple and attractive crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this, especially for the price! I washed it and ironed it - which is necessary - and it looks great on the crib. I have the crib on the highest setting and the skirt hangs about 6 inches off the ground. I wish it were floor length, but it doesn't look bad. For reference, I have the Davinci Jenny Lind crib, and the skirt hangs just below the bottom rail. I'm happy I didn't waste money on a more expensive crib skirt when this one is perfectly attractive and functional. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons crib and its perfect! Not frilly or anything, just a regular ruffle. looks well made too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Basic but good quality
customer_reviews.text: The crib skirt is basic but very good quality. No smell from packaging and all wrinkles came out when washed before use. For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: JessInLINY

customer_reviews.title: White one is very sheer, cheaply made, and a waste of money..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the white crib skirt, which turned out to be extremely sheer and made of a very wrinkle-prone fabric. When I put it in our daughter's crib and stood back, it looked gray and dingy because it is so incredibly sheer! Dioes not look anything like the refreshing white like in the photo. I bought it because of the good reviews, but I can't justify the good ratings, ESPECIALLY not for $22! Perhaps the other colors camouflage the sheerness. If you are looking for a white crib skirt, don't buy this one! Spend the extra few dollars on a thicker, quality one. I ended up buying a soft chenille one from Target for $29.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: grayish white, but works.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this m it works fine ans fits a standard crib. It wasn't as crisp a white as I hoped for. It is more of a grayish white.
customer_reviews.author: ShopsForEverything

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt looks great and I can't believe how little I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. If you wash and tumble dry on low, no ironing needed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This baby crib ruffle isn't the most frilly or high quality but it is a very good bargain for the price. The quality is nice. You pay for what you get. I wasn't looking for an eye catcher but this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: S. Massey

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't as of yet put this on my sons crib, as we're waiting for his mattress to arrive. but it's nicely made and just as pictured! you will need to wash & iron it a bit before you put it on the crib but it's small enough that I can handle that at home :) and it will be long enough to "hide" what I stash under his crib!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice crib skirt, perfect for my baby boy nursery, exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't purchase too many products online but I made a good decision buying this crib skirt. It's cotton material with the ruffled look I was searching for. Looks great with the crib. Can be used for either gender and easy to wash. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gagan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an antique crib I was turning into a daybed. Perfect for what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great Price, Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. Perfect length and fit. I would definitely recommend this item if you are looking for a simple nice crib skirt.
customer_reviews.author: David Kleinman

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: It isn't anything very special but I guess it does what it is suppose to...cheap quality and hard to iron.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Decent sheet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a plain white crib skirt for my son's crib. The sheet I saw at Buy Buy Baby was of very cheap quality. This sheet is an improvement but not as thick as something you would find at Pottery Barn Kids. Overall a decent sheet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good guality
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, good color, and it washed well. Just what I expected but a little expensive for a crib dust ruffle.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Denton

customer_reviews.title: simple white crib skirt, just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I added another colored layer of fabric and a ribbon trim to this simple crib skirt to customize it. It turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Serves its' purpose. cheap, white crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap white crib skirt, which is what I was looking for so this works out well. It's a thin material that took a lot of ironing after washing to make it look nice. I mean a lot of ironing.
customer_reviews.author: SarahSmile

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but thin
customer_reviews.text: Although pretty, the material is rather thin and doesn't reach the floor with our "Jenny Lind" look a like crib from here on Amazon. We kept it because the price was good but if you're looking for quality I would try another. If this was helpful for you, please mark as helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Abby WelchTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Issue with sizing but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: A little small but nothing noticeable; we just put the smaller side against the wall. The length was great for our Jenny Lind crib.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer Girl

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: Although this product fulfills the function of a crib skirt, I don't like the way it looks. I find that the white is much too stark and sterile. It is not a soft white by any means. I bought a "white" sheet and it's a much more natural white. I also find that the fabric is somewhat stiff. It doesn't hang as naturally as I would like. However, this is a cheaper alternative so you sort of get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The bed sheet was perfect. It was very white and soft. It fit perfectly on my sons mattress. It is also very easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Crib Sheet Is Basic
customer_reviews.text: The crib sheet is your basic white crib sheet...but...that is what I was looking for to match the other bedding I had for the crib. It is good quality, washed up nice, and came right away in the mail. If you are looking for a basic crib sheet, you'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly. I looked for crib skirts at the boutiques and higher priced stores. Then I said to myself "It's a crib skirt and how much of a statement will it make in the nursery?" Not Much. I purchased this and it fits perfect and does exactly what a crib skirt does hides the all the parts under the mattress. Don't waste your money on a high priced crib skirt. Buy this one and spend your savings on something that really matters like a car seat, high chair or stroller.
customer_reviews.author: RunEmRun

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a great mattress for our little girl and found great reviews for this mattress. It is light and firm. It fit our Costco Devon crib PERFECTLY. So I am a happy customer! The only thing is the price fluctuates a lot and I heard it drops on Fridays...wish I would have known that when I ordered it on a Sunday!
customer_reviews.author: MissB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: These are great crib skirts for the price. I was definitely hoping they would be just a tad frillier with more ruffles, but they serve their purpose and have held up nicely over the past few months of nightly use. The white is very crisp and the wrinkles from the packaging work out easily within a few days; they also hold up nicely in a delicate cycle wash. Because of the lack of a lot of ruffles, I could definitely see this as a unisex crib skirt that would match any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt is a wonderful addition to your babies supplies. We decided not to purchase a traditional crib bedding set...as they can be expensive and you might end up not using all of the pieces. In additon, we prefer minimal accessories when decorating. This crib skirt is a perfect piece for our little ones crib. We decided to pair it with a white sheet and grey/white chevron print blanket. We would highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Tamika S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but very wrinkled.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bedskirt. I’m using it on a toddler bed. I love that it has skits on the 4 sides to accommodate the toddler bed. Very good quality for the money _ However, it is very wrinkly and u will have to invest time in ironing it. After every wash.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Cute bed skirt, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my daughters crib, great for the cost my only complain is it’s a little short Lifts about 2-3 inches off the floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This seems like it shrank during the first wash & dry (dried on low), which is disappointing... It also got very wrinkly (I have 3 small children - I have no time to iron a crib skirt!), so it doesn't hang nicely. It's ok for the price, but the other crib skirts I've had in the past fit better and draped better for similar prices. I don't think I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this as it didn't fit the "arms" of the box spring for the crib. It was very long when the crib was set at it's lowest setting and just didn't "fit". Still give it three stars as the material and quality were good. Returned with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and pretty thick
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and pretty thick, especially for the price. I’m a total perfectionist and this looks great and was pretty easy to get the wrinkles out of too!
customer_reviews.author: leslies

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bed skirt for baby’s crib! So worth the money. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: I had to iron this after washing, and it doesn't fit the same around all 4 corners. All 4 corners have slits in them and they show the metal part of the crib frame in the front.
customer_reviews.author: KLA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this and would buy again! Very pretty and easy to install/put down.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Tesh

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product.  Nothing Fancy.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Fits well, from a company that seems to make good products as we've purchased multiple items from them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Raj S

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my nursery! It was cheap but it doesn’t look cheap. I would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mallery

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Irons nice and sharp after a wash too. It’s gender neutral as well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sepe

customer_reviews.title: Nice but quality not quite as expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice but quality not quite as expected. Good for price. Lengths is good even for the crib that is set up high for a newborn. Skirt still reaches bottom of crib region,
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

product_meta.title: American Baby Company 100% Natural Cotton Percale Ruffled Crib Skirt, White, Soft Breathable, for Boys and Girls
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteOur elegant 100% cotton percale crib skirt adds a touch of luxury to basic infant crib bedding. The durable 100% cotton centerpiece covers the crib spring or board to help protect the mattress. The crib bed skirt is 13.5" deep with a finished baby hem and split corners to help make changing it quick and easy. Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low for best results.
feature_bullets: 100% cotton percale 220 thread count. Centerpiece is made of 100% durable cotton
13.5" skirt has a finished baby hem and split corners.
STYLE. Mix with our solid and print bedding separates to customize your look
EASY to CLEAN. Machine wash cold. Tumble Dry Low.
